title: The Beef Jerky Gang
description: Things Are About To ChangeWhen Peter Mills descends into the creepy basement of Finley Junior High, he discovers a dark and twisted   girls haven't always ruled the world.Now armed with a book of ancient, forbidden man secrets (such as how to make paper airplanes, stink bombs, and beef jerky), Peter and his friends think they've found the recipe to changing their lives.  But the boys of the Beef Jerky Gang will soon find out that the girls aren't about to give up control to a bunch of prank-pulling punks.
author: Daniel Kenney
